content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ background_image=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/military2019.jpg” min_height=”350px” custom_padding=”|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ custom_margin=”||0px” custom_padding=”|0px|63px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_post_title meta=”off” _builder_version=”3.25.3″ title_font=”|700|||||||” title_text_color=”#00578c” title_font_size=”30px” custom_margin=”||0px” custom_padding=”||0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_post_title][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.0.2″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”25px” custom_padding=”0px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Discover Honor

When our drivers serve our customers, they are part of something greater than themselves. We bet you know a thing or two about that. If you are looking for a career beyond your military service, consider Dot Transportation, Inc. (DTI).

Dot’s founder, Robert Tracy, honorably served our country during World War II. For this reason, DTI honors military veterans and has increased the number of veterans hired tenfold in the last 10 years. 

Plus, 96 percent of Dot’s veteran drivers would recommend this job to other veterans.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_video src=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GX41FC4D5nE” _builder_version=”4.0.2″ min_height=”269px” custom_padding=”69px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_video][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

What We Offer to Veteran Drivers

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_toggle title=”Veteran Employee Resource Group” admin_label=”Veteran Employee Resource Group” _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dot provides veteran drivers the chance to participate in the Veteran Employee Resource Group (VERG) to help recruit, retain, and improve our opportunities for veterans. This group not only helps our employees but also conducts community service in our surrounding communities to support veterans.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Army PaYS Program” admin_label=”Army PaYS Program” _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

One of our goals is to help veterans transition from their military service to a fulfilling driving career. We work with the Army PaYS program—which guarantees a job interview for veterans—and with Army transition offices in the U.S. to recruit transitioning personnel.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_toggle title=”VA-Approved Apprenticeship” admin_label=”VA-Approved Apprenticeship” _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Many of our veteran drivers have come to us through a VA-approved apprenticeship.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”Illinois Hires Heroes Consortium” admin_label=”Illinois Hires Heroes Consortium” _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

We have also hired many veterans at our Mt. Sterling and University Park locations through the Illinois Hires Heroes Consortium.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f9f9f9″ global_module=”33896″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#0065a4″ min_height=”125px” custom_margin=”35px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Apply-Now@2x.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” height_tablet=”226px” height_phone=”150px” height_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_3_font=”|700|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_3_font_size=”25px” header_3_line_height=”1.7em” custom_margin=”8%||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|20px||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”|20px||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Apply Today & Discover Your Forever Career

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”https://intelliapp.driverapponline.com/c/dotfoods?r=drivefordot” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Apply Now” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”13%||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”0%||35px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”0%||30px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”18px” animation_style=”bounce” animation_direction=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Need More Information Before You Apply? We’d love to talk to you.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.2″ custom_margin=”36px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

From Our Veterans

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.0.2″ custom_margin=”41px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ background_color=”#f5f5f5″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Driver Warren Freeman” job_title=”Army 1992-2018″ portrait_url=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/Freeman.jpg” _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

“In the military, you’ve got your leaders and good leaders care for their subordinates. And here at Dot, I’ve felt like I’m part of a family.”

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ background_color=”#f5f5f5″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Driver Adam McKinney” job_title=”Army 1999-2011″ portrait_url=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/McKinney_Adam.jpeg” _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

“Dot’s been great to me and my family. I get home when I need to be. They’re really flexible with me. It just shows you how much they care about their people—veterans included.”

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ background_color=”#f5f5f5″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Driver Robby Case” job_title=”Army 2003-2017″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

“The Core Values from the Army are loyalty, respect, selfless service, honor, integrity, and personal courage. In my eyes, all of these have a relation to how Dot operates every single day.”

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ background_color=”#f5f5f5″ custom_margin=”33px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_testimonial author=”Paul Mugerditchian” portrait_url=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/paul.jpg” quote_icon_color=”#000000″ quote_icon_background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ min_height=”144px” border_width_all_portrait=”3px” border_color_all_portrait=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dot Foods and Dot Transportation are fortunate to employ veterans in all areas of our business. We want to recognize their service and sacrifice—and that of all members of the military everywhere.

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Discover More

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/VERGBlog.jpg” _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.0.2″ text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Honoring our Veterans: Dot’s Employee Resource Group

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://drivefordot.com/blog/honoring-and-hiring-our-veterans/” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Read More” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/veteran_marketing_awardBlog.jpg” _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.0.2″ text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dot’s Branding Team Wins Award for Honoring Our Veterans

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://drivefordot.com/blog/dots-branding-team-wins-award-for-honoring-our-veterans/” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://drivefordot.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/FB_Live_Veteran_TrailerBlog.jpg” _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.0.2″ text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]Dot Equipment & Veteran
Trailers Preview[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://drivefordot.com/blog/dot-equipment-veteran-trailer-preview/” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Watch Now” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.0.2″ text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dot Transportation Honors Veterans:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_video src=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GX41FC4D5nE&list=PLb44UTPk8quCiI5-8ntxzLIBD1BJTDzaO” _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_video][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.0.2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.0.2″ text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

excerpt.rendered: Discover Honor When our drivers serve our customers, they are part of something greater than themselves. We bet you know a thing or two about that. If you are looking for a career beyond your military service, consider Dot Transportation, Inc. (DTI). Dot’s founder, Robert Tracy, honorably served our country during World War II. For […]

meta._et_pb_old_content:
Military Veterans

DTI honors military veterans and has increased the number of veterans hired tenfold in the last ten years. We participate in the U.S. Army’s Partnership for Youth Success Program (PaYS), which guarantees a job interview for veterans in the program. We actively work with Army transition offices around the country to recruit transitioning military personnel. If you are a military veteran from any branch of the service and are interested in a driving career, DTI would like to talk with you!

Partners

Dot Transportation is committed to hiring a diverse group of drivers. We are active members in many national trucking and food industry associations.

  • American Trucking Associations
  • Georgia Motor Trucking Association
  • Hispanic Trucking Association
  • Idaho Trucking Association
  • Illinois Trucking Association
  • Maryland Motor Truck Association
  • Mid-West Truckers Association
  • National Association for Minority Truckers
  • National Private Truck Council
  • Women in Trucking
